attributes.action: Get Tony Blair and George Bush charged with war crimes over the invasion of Iraq
attributes.background: In 2001 Tony Blair and U.S President George Bush led this country into a bloody conflict in the middle east based on utter lies and deception. Millions of innocent citizens were killed to get "weapons of mass destruction" that were never there in the first place.

rejection.details:
Charges and trials for war crimes are the responsibility of the International Criminal Court (ICC). You can find out more about the ICC here:

https://www.icc-cpi.int/en_menus/icc/Pages/default.aspx
